title: Anivia main need a new champ
body: Hi i was an anivia main for most of season 5 and all of season 6 but with the 6.23 changes i have lost my love for the champion (and i really hope it gets reverted like srsly she cant trade at 6 anymore against anyone with a dash and we are in an assassin meta) so  i need a new main someone who has the easy combos and burst of pre nerf anivia any suggestions?

replies.body: Go {{champion:112}}, he's way better than her in almost every aspect, superior laning, transitions well into the mid and late game, better wave clear and powerful burst at level 6 that can delete a squishy in one rotation.
FIGHT ME MATE, ANIVIA FOR LIFE

with anivia, they did it so u cant burst for no reason, gives enemies a chance to dodge 100% ap scaling point and click shot, with also thunderlords and some slowing, so this way if u catch them off guard you can do more dmg overall, and her ultimate gives her a chance at zoning in fights easier, as the enemy doesnt usually stay in your pool for more than 3 secs unless u wall them before they leave, and before they leave again u stun them but then again
{{summoner:4}}
as for a new champion, how about karthus or twisted fate
and finally, it wasnt really a nerf for anivia, but really a change to how she can zone and not have point and click easyness( trust me, anivia is my second main)

The reason i first went to anivia was because i loved her story why i loved her was because of her lane dominance i used her to climb out of bronze in season 6 AND hit my gold promos (i failed them 4 times ;-;) but now they have changed her laning playstyle i love her as a champion and she will always be the champ that got me out of bronze but its time to move on. as Requiemsfire said Viktor is probably my best choice...

p.s i was actually decent with anivia currently i am 144 on best anivia oce (league of graphs) with a all time high of 50
